sentences.en: Before he could interrogate Harravan, though, the pirate was mysteriously murdered in prison.
sentences.cn: 但在他审问哈拉万之前, 这个海盗就莫名其妙地在监狱里被人杀了.

sentences.en: But, leaving buy interrogate and arrest to be passed on property is different.
sentences.cn: 但是, 留置盘问与拘传在性质上是不同的.

sentences.en: DeSalvo gets a call from his superiors giving Jack permission to interrogate the prisoner.
sentences.cn: 迪沙佛接到上级的电话,批准了杰克审讯维克托.

sentences.en: Home minister would definitely interrogate me on why I had left it there.
sentences.cn: 所以,我就将整篮的衣服夹都放在它旁边,大家有个“照应”,内政部长也毕竟会问起此事.

sentences.en: Mason decides to interrogate Penticoff himself.
sentences.cn: 梅森决定亲自审问彭蒂科夫.

sentences.en: One , aggrandizement spot supervises and direct consciousness, thorough a gleam of catchs contradictory interrogate to inscribe.
sentences.cn: 强化现场督办意识, 深入一线抓矛盾查问题.

sentences.en: Police interrogate his name and address.
sentences.cn: 警察询问他的名字和地址.

sentences.en: Some programs need to directly interrogate the dynamic type of an object at run time.
sentences.cn: 一些程序需要在运行时直接询问对象的动态类型.

sentences.en: Starts to interrogate to me, scolds.
sentences.cn: 开始对我质问, 责骂.

sentences.en: The judges may interrogate the defendant.
sentences.cn: 审判人员可以讯问被告人.

sentences.en: The police interrogated the suspect for several hours.
sentences.cn: 警察盘问了这名嫌疑犯好几个小时。

sentences.en: The teacher encouraged us to think and interrogate, and tried to resolve all our questions.
sentences.cn: 老师常鼓励学生思考及发问, 并解答同学之疑问.

sentences.en: Where is his son? I need interrogate him at once.
sentences.cn: “他儿子在哪里? 我要马上审问他. ”

sentences.en: Why? So you can interrogate him?
sentences.cn: 为什么? 这样你就可以审讯他了?

sentences.en: You wish to Interrogate the prisoner?

words.tran_cn: 讯问；审问；[语] 疑问句

trans.tran_en: to ask someone a lot of questions for a long time in order to get information, sometimes using threats

trans.tran_cn: 询问，审问，提出问题，[计]询问
trans.tran_en: to ask someone a lot of questions for a long time in order to get information, sometimes using threats
